name: dream-ball
effect: Can only be used in Entree Forest, to catch Pokémon encountered in the Dream World. Used in battle : Catches a wild Pokémon without fail.
short_effect: Catches Pokémon found in the Dream World.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A special Poké Ball that appears in your Bag out of nowhere in the Entree Forest. It can catch any Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A special Poké Ball that appears in your Bag out of nowhere in the Entree Forest. It can catch any Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A special Poké Ball that appears in your Bag out of nowhere in the Entree Forest. It can catch any Pokémon.
